knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#load packages
```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library("readxl")
library(ggpubr)

```


# Import data
```{r}
data <- read_excel("data_files_for_plotting/Thickness_sphere_FOR_PLOTTING.xlsx" )

```

# Make data frame
```{r}

df <- na.omit(data.frame(
  Depth = -1* data$`Depth 3` ,
  value = data$`Csph thickness (µm)`
))



plot <- ggplot( data = df, aes(y = value, x = Depth)) +
  geom_point( color = "black", size =2 )+
  geom_line(color = "black", size =1)+
  xlim(-5000, 0) +
  ylim(1,2) +
  labs(y = 'Sphere thickness [µm]', x = 'Depth [m]') +
  theme_classic()+
  coord_flip()

plot
```
